name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

directory.description: A directory where the library is placed.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

simpleModuleName.description: Keep the module name simple (when using `--directory`).

skipPostInstall.description: Do not add or append `ngcc` to the `postinstall` script in `package.json`.

skipTsConfig.description: Do not update `tsconfig.json` for development experience.

routing.description: Add router configuration. See `lazy` for more information.

lazy.description: Add `RouterModule.forChild` when set to true, and a simple array of routes when set to false.

parentModule.description: Update the router configuration of the parent module using `loadChildren` or `children`, depending on what `lazy` is set to.

tags.description: Add tags to the library (used for linting).

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`. Must be a valid npm name.

strict.description: Create a library with stricter type checking and build optimization options.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into `<projectRoot>/project.json` rather than including it inside `workspace.json`.

compilationMode.description: Specifies the compilation mode to use. If not specified, it will default to `partial` for publishable libraries and to `full` for buildable libraries. The `full` value can not be used for publishable libraries.

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

addTailwind.description: Whether to configure Tailwind CSS for the application. It can only be used with buildable and publishable libraries. Non-buildable libraries will use the application's Tailwind configuration.

skipModule.description: Whether to skip the creation of a default module when generating the library.
